mapper.select: SELECT talk_idx AS talkIdx, talk_nickname AS talkNickname, talk_email AS talkEmail, talk_text AS talkText, talk_profile as talkProfile, talk_created_at AS talkCreatedAt, talk_updated_at AS talkUpdatedAt FROM talk ORDER BY GREATEST(talk_created_at, talk_updated_at) DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total FROM talk
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO talk (talk_nickname, talk_email, talk_text, talk_profile) VALUES (#{talkNickname}, #{talkEmail}, #{talkText}, #{talkProfile})
mapper.update: UPDATE talk SET talk_text = #{updatedText}, talk_updated_at = NOW() WHERE talk_idx = #{talkIdx}
